name: CPPointOfInterestTemplateDelegate
desc: The methods to handle a Point of Interest template’s events.

items.name: func pointOfInterestTemplate(CPPointOfInterestTemplate, didChangeMapRegion: MKCoordinateRegion)
items.desc: Tells the delegate about changes to the visible region of the template’s map.

items.name: func pointOfInterestTemplate(CPPointOfInterestTemplate, didSelectPointOfInterest: CPPointOfInterest)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the user selects a point of interest.
